bill_title: Honoring Nisland, South Dakota, on the occasion of its centennial celebration.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Nisland, South Dakota, on the occasion of its centennial celebration. WHEREAS, Nisland's citizens have enriched our state's culture with their exceptional attainments in leadership, sports, music, literature, and art, and are known for their love of agriculture, entertainment, and community history, which they strive to preserve for future generations; and WHEREAS, this year's centennial celebration day, Sunday, September 5, 2010, will mark the one hundredth birthday of the city with a parade, community barbecue, displays of Nisland memorabilia and pictures, and tours of the former Nisland school, the Nisland fair grounds, and the community: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature congratulates all South Dakotans of Nisland ancestry and invites everyone to participate in the Nisland centennial celebration, Sunday, September 5, 2010.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Nisland, South Dakota, on the occasion of its centennial celebration. WHEREAS, Nisland's citizens have enriched our state's culture with their exceptional attainments in leadership, sports, music, literature, and art, and are known for their love of agriculture, entertainment, and community history, which they strive to preserve for future generations; and WHEREAS, this year's centennial celebration day, Sunday, September 5, 2010, will mark the one hundredth birthday of the city with a parade, community barbecue, displays of Nisland memorabilia and pictures, and tours of the former Nisland school, the Nisland fair grounds, and the community: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature congratulates all South Dakotans of Nisland ancestry and invites everyone to participate in the Nisland centennial celebration, Sunday, September 5, 2010. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
